value.name: priority
value.tooltip: When multiple listeners are in different sound environments in split screen, the combined environment will be the one with the highest priority..

value.name: room intensity hf
value.tooltip: Intensity of the room effect above the reference high frequency.

value.name: room rolloff 0 to 10
value.tooltip: How quickly the room effect rolls off, from 0.0 to 10.0.

value.name: hf reference20 to 2
value.tooltip: For hf values, what frequency defines hf, from 20 to 20,000.
